incidents.name: Cannot Place IoT Hardware Orders to Newly Added Addresses

incident_updates.body: When adding a new address to ship Internet of Things (IoT) orders to, the customer name field is not being properly stored. This field is critical for delivering IoT hardware. Any orders placed to addresses missing this field will be rejected. Engineering team has deployed a fix and no issues have been identified at this point.
